revision.text:
Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
== Uncategorized Tasks == (More to Be added only currently up to [[Dawn Stone]] in terms of Alphabetically. == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # Create a page about [[Pokedollar]], preferably with detailed information like [[Dungeon Tokens]]. # Create a [[Hatchery]] page. # make [[Berry Master]] page better, its too blank and raw right now. # in [[Berry Master]] page, add links to various key words. # Upload images of all items that can be found in [[underground]]. # in [[Diamonds]] page, add images of all items before their names. # in [[Diamonds]] page, remove link of each item in the table as there is no point of making a page for every individual item. # in [[Diamonds]] page, add links to all the shops in masterball section. # in [[Diamonds]] page, lift align the ""Total Cost" column. === Finishing Touches === # in [[Aguav]] update the harvest stage table and berry flavour in infobox, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Aguav]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # Upload Pokedollar coin image from ingame. # add pokedollar coin image in Upgrade Cost section of the table in [[Amulet Coin]]. # in [[Babiri]] update the harvest stage table, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Babiri]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # Add infobox like image on the right showing details and pic of [[Battle Frontier]]. # Add images of each item in front of their name in the tables of [[Battle Frontier]]. # in [[Battle Points]] page, create a heading as "Uses", see [[Diamonds]] page for reference. # in [[Belue]] update the harvest stage table and berry flavour in infobox, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Belue]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Berries]] page, remove the columns listing time of each stage of berry and replace them with "Time needed for ripe" and "Death time" to make space on page for other things. # in [[Berries]] page, edit each table heading row and replace text "Money" with "Farm Points". # in [[Berries]] page, add the Farm Point {{farmpoints}} image in all tables and make this column in all tables right aligned. # in [[Berries]] page, add image of all the berries before there name in all tables. # in [[Blaze Cassette]] page, add pokedollar image in the "Upgrade Cost" column of the table. # in [[Bluk]] update the harvest stage table, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Bluk]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Cell Battery]] page, add pokedollar image in the "Upgrade Cost" column of the table. # in [[Charti]] update the harvest stage table, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Charti]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Chilan]] update the harvest stage table, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Chilan]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Chople]] update the harvest stage table, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Chople]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Coba]] update the harvest stage table and berry flavour in infobox, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Coba]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Colbur]] update the harvest stage table and berry flavour in infobox, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Colbur]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Cornn]] update the harvest stage table and berry flavour in infobox, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Cornn]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Custap]] update the harvest stage table, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Custap]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Dawn Stone]] page, add link to key text to link the [[shops]] page and reduce the amount of header texts to get rid of Contents section on such small page. # in [[Deepsea Scale]] page, add link to key text to link the [[shops]] page and reduce the amount of header texts to get rid of Contents section on such small page. # in [[Deepsea Tooth]] page, add link to key text to link the [[shops]] page and reduce the amount of header texts to get rid of Contents section on such small page. # in [[Dock]] page, add more information and image of dock. # in [[Dragon Egg]] page, complete the list of shops with link to [[Shops]] page, add {{Questpoints}} image in Price column. # in [[Dragon Scale]] page, add link to key text to link the [[shops]] page and reduce the amount of header texts to get rid of Contents section on such small page. # in [[Dubious Disc]] page, add link to key text to link the [[shops]] page and reduce the amount of header texts to get rid of Contents section on such small page. # in [[Durin]] update the harvest stage table and berry flavour in infobox, see [[Roseli]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Durin]] add images of each berry in table of the Formation section, see [[Yache]] page for reference on what to do. # in [[Dawn Stone]] page, add link to key text to link the [[shops]] page and reduce the amount of header texts to get rid of Contents section on such small page. === Updating === === Formatting === # in [[Burned Tower]] page, make text cleaner by making it similar to [[Flower Paradise]] page. # in [[Cave of Origin]] page, make text cleaner by making it similar to [[Flower Paradise]] page. # in [[Cerulean Cave]] page, make text cleaner by making it similar to [[Flower Paradise]] page. # in [[Dark Cave]] page, make text cleaner by making it similar to [[Flower Paradise]] page. # in [[Digletts Cave]] page, make text cleaner by making it similar to [[Flower Paradise]] page. # in [[Distortion World]] page, make text cleaner by making it similar to [[Flower Paradise]] page. # in [[Dungeon ticket]] page, make the image bigger in infobox, add link to shop == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # Upload all pokemon images non-shiny and shiny version. # Add images of pokemon before their names in [[Baby Pok√©mon]], [[Burned Tower]], [[Cave of Origin]], [[Cerulean Cave]], [[Dark Cave]], [[Dawn Stone]], [[Deepsea Scale]][[Deepsea Tooth]], [[Digletts Cave]], [[Distortion World]], [[Dragon Egg]], [[Dragon Scale]], [[Dubious Disc]], [[Dawn Stone]]
